asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)

Bash("C:\\Users\\u\\.fly\\bin\\flyctl.exe" ssh console -a naverpay-delivery-tracker -C "python3 -c ""
import httpx
import re

url = ''https://m.blog.naver.com/kwanwoo8181/224109371417''
resp = httpx.get\(url, headers={''User-Agent'': ''Mozilla/5.0''}\)
html = resp.text

# 날짜 패턴 찾기
dates = re.findall\(r''20[0-9]{2}[.\\-/ ][0-9]{1,2}[.\\-/ ][0-9]{1,2}'', html\)
print\(''Found dates:'', dates[:5]\)

# 날짜 관련 클래스 찾기
date_classes = re.findall\(r''class=[""\\'']\([^""\\'']*\(date|Date\)[^""\\'']*\)[""\\'']'', html\)
print\(''Date classes:'', date_classes[:5]\)
""")

Bash("C:\\Users\\u\\.fly\\bin\\flyctl.exe" ssh console -a naverpay-delivery-tracker -C "python3 -c ""
import httpx
import re
url = ''https://m.blog.naver.com/kwanwoo8181/224109371417''
resp = httpx.get\(url, headers={''User-Agent'': ''Mozilla/5.0''}\)
html = resp.text

# addDate 또는 logDate 필드 찾기
add_date = re.findall\(r''addDate[^0-9]*\([0-9]{14}\)'', html\)
log_date = re.findall\(r''logDate[^0-9]*\([0-9]{14}\)'', html\)
mod_date = re.findall\(r''modifyDate[^0-9]*\([0-9]{14}\)'', html\)

print\(''addDate:'', add_date[:3]\)
print\(''logDate:'', log_date[:3]\)
print\(''modifyDate:'', mod_date[:3]\)
""")

Bash("C:\\Users\\u\\.fly\\bin\\flyctl.exe" ssh console -a naverpay-delivery-tracker -C "python3 -c ""
import httpx
import re
import json

# PostView 페이지 확인 \(JSON이 있는 곳\)
url = ''https://blog.naver.com/PostView.naver?blogId=kwanwoo8181&logNo=224109371417&redirect=Dlog''
resp = httpx.get\(url, headers={''User-Agent'': ''Mozilla/5.0''}, follow_redirects=True\)
html = resp.text

# __PRELOADED_STATE__ JSON 찾기
match = re.search\(r''__PRELOADED_STATE__\\s*=\\s*\({.+?}\);'', html, re.DOTALL\)
if match:
    try:
        data = json.loads\(match.group\(1\)\)
        post = data.get\(''post'', {}\).get\(''post'', {}\)
        print\(''addDate:'', post.get\(''addDate''\)\)
        print\(''logDate:'', post.get\(''logDate''\)\)
        print\(''modifyDate:'', post.get\(''modifyDate''\)\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(''Parse error:'', e\)
else:
    print\(''No preload data found''\)
    # 날짜 관련 문자열 검색
    dates = re.findall\(r''\(add|log|modify\)Date[^:]*:[^0-9]*\([0-9]{8,14}\)'', html[:50000]\)
    print\(''Date patterns:'', dates[:5]\)
""")

Bash("C:\\Users\\u\\.fly\\bin\\flyctl.exe" ssh console -a naverpay-delivery-tracker -C "python3 -c ""
import httpx
import re

# 실제 블로그 페이지 확인
url = ''https://m.blog.naver.com/waxnot7000''
resp = httpx.get\(url, headers={''User-Agent'': ''Mozilla/5.0''}\)
html = resp.text[:100000]

# 다양한 날짜 패턴 찾기
patterns = [
    r''\(20[0-9]{12}\)'',  # 14자리 타임스탬프
    r''20[0-9]{2}\\.[0-9]{1,2}\\.[0-9]{1,2}'',  # YYYY.MM.DD
    r''20[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{1,2}-[0-9]{1,2}'',  # YYYY-MM-DD
    r''datetime.*20[0-9]{2}'',  # datetime 속성
]

for p in patterns:
    matches = re.findall\(p, html\)
    if matches:
        print\(f''Pattern {p}: {matches[:3]}''\)""")

import sqlite3
import time
time.sleep\(90\)  # 1.5분 대기

conn = sqlite3.connect\(''/app/data/blog_analyzer.db''\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

# 최근 10개 샘플의 post_age_days 확인
cursor.execute\(''SELECT blog_id, heading_count, post_age_days, collected_at FROM learning_samples ORDER BY collected_at DESC LIMIT 10''\)
print\(''Recent samples:''\)
for row in cursor.fetchall\(\):
    print\(row\)

# post_age_days가 NOT NULL인 비율
cursor.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM learning_samples WHERE post_age_days IS NOT NULL''\)
not_null = cursor.fetchone\(\)[0]
cursor.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM learning_samples''\)
total = cursor.fetchone\(\)[0]
print\(f''\\npost_age_days NOT NULL: {not_null}/{total} \({not_null*100/total:.1f}%\)''\)
conn.close\(\)
""")

Bash("C:\\Users\\u\\.fly\\bin\\flyctl.exe" ssh console -a naverpay-delivery-tracker -C "python3 -c ""
import httpx
import re
from datetime import datetime

# 실제 블로그 글 가져오기
url = ''https://m.blog.naver.com/jasonmoondistri/223733093098''
resp = httpx.get\(url, headers={''User-Agent'': ''Mozilla/5.0''}\)
html = resp.text

# 방법 4 정규식 테스트
date_match = re.search\(r''\(20[12][0-9]\)[\\.\\-/]\([01]?[0-9]\)[\\.\\-/]\([0-3]?[0-9]\)'', html\)
if date_match:
    y, m, d = int\(date_match.group\(1\)\), int\(date_match.group\(2\)\), int\(date_match.group\(3\)\)
    print\(f''Found: {y}.{m}.{d}''\)
    if 1 <= m <= 12 and 1 <= d <= 31:
        post_date = datetime\(y, m, d\)
        age = \(datetime.now\(\) - post_date\).days
        print\(f''Age: {age} days''\)
else:
    print\(''No date found''\)

# 날짜 패턴 확인
dates = re.findall\(r''20[12][0-9][\\.\\-/][0-9]{1,2}[\\.\\-/][0-9]{1,2}'', html\)
print\(f''All dates: {dates[:5]}''\)""")

Bash("C:\\Users\\u\\.fly\\bin\\flyctl.exe" ssh console -a naverpay-delivery-tracker -C "python3 -c ""
import httpx
import re

url = ''https://m.blog.naver.com/jasonmoondistri/223733093098''
resp = httpx.get\(url, headers={''User-Agent'': ''Mozilla/5.0''}\)
html = resp.text

# 숫자 패턴 찾기
nums = re.findall\(r''202[0-9]{5,12}'', html\)
print\(f''Long numbers: {set\(nums\)}''\)

# 날짜 관련 클래스/태그 찾기
date_tags = re.findall\(r''<[^>]*\(date|time|publishedDate|addDate|written\)[^>]*>[^<]*<'', html, re.IGNORECASE\)
print\(f''Date tags: {date_tags[:5]}''\)""")

Bash("C:\\Users\\u\\.fly\\bin\\flyctl.exe" ssh console -a naverpay-delivery-tracker -C "python3 -c ""
import httpx
import re

# 데스크탑 PostView 페이지
url = ''https://blog.naver.com/PostView.naver?blogId=jasonmoondistri&logNo=223733093098''
resp = httpx.get\(url, headers={''User-Agent'': ''Mozilla/5.0 \(Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64\)''}, follow_redirects=True\)
html = resp.text[:50000]

# 날짜 패턴 찾기
dates = re.findall\(r''20[12][0-9][\\.\\-/][0-9]{1,2}[\\.\\-/][0-9]{1,2}'', html\)
print\(f''Dates found: {dates[:10]}''\)

# addDate, logDate 찾기
add_dates = re.findall\(r''\(addDate|logDate|publishDate\)[^0-9]{0,10}\([0-9]{8,14}\)'', html, re.IGNORECASE\)
print\(f''Timestamp dates: {add_dates[:5]}''\)""")

import httpx
import json
import os

# 네이버 API로 검색
client_id = os.environ.get\(''NAVER_CLIENT_ID'', ''''\)
client_secret = os.environ.get\(''NAVER_CLIENT_SECRET'', ''''\)

headers = {
    ''X-Naver-Client-Id'': client_id,
    ''X-Naver-Client-Secret'': client_secret
}

resp = httpx.get\(
    ''https://openapi.naver.com/v1/search/blog.json?query=강남맛집&display=3'',
    headers=headers
\)

data = resp.json\(\)
for item in data.get\(''items'', []\)[:3]:
    print\(f''postdate: {item.get\(\\""postdate\\""\)}, title: {item.get\(\\""title\\""\)[:30]}''\)""")

Bash("C:\\Users\\u\\.fly\\bin\\flyctl.exe" ssh console -a naverpay-delivery-tracker -C "python3 -c ""
import sqlite3
import os

db_path = ''/data/blog_analyzer.db''
print\(f''DB path: {db_path}''\)
print\(f''DB exists: {os.path.exists\(db_path\)}''\)

conn = sqlite3.connect\(db_path\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

# Create users table
cursor.execute\(''''''
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users \(
        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
        email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
        hashed_password TEXT NOT NULL,
        name TEXT,
        blog_id TEXT,
        is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1,
        is_verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
        is_admin BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
        is_premium_granted BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
        plan TEXT DEFAULT ''free'',
        subscription_expires_at TIMESTAMP,
        granted_by INTEGER,
        granted_at TIMESTAMP,
        memo TEXT,
        created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
        updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    \)
''''''\)
cursor.execute\(''CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_users_email ON users\(email\)''\)
cursor.execute\(''CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_users_plan ON users\(plan\)''\)
conn.commit\(\)

# Verify
cursor.execute\(\\""SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table''\\""\)
tables = [row[0] for row in cursor.fetchall\(\)]
print\(f''Tables now: {tables}''\)

conn.close\(\)
print\(''Done!''\)
""")

conn.close\(\)
""")

import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\(''/data/blog_analyzer.db''\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

# 학습 샘플 통계
cursor.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM learning_samples''\)
total = cursor.fetchone\(\)[0]

# 최근 샘플 날짜
cursor.execute\(''SELECT collected_at FROM learning_samples ORDER BY collected_at DESC LIMIT 1''\)
latest = cursor.fetchone\(\)

# 예측 정확도 관련 테이블 확인
cursor.execute\(\\""SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table'' AND name LIKE ''%predict%''\\""\)
tables = cursor.fetchall\(\)

print\(f''Total samples: {total}''\)
print\(f''Latest: {latest}''\)
print\(f''Prediction tables: {tables}''\)

# prediction_results 테이블 확인
cursor.execute\(\\""SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table''\\""\)
all_tables = [t[0] for t in cursor.fetchall\(\)]
print\(f''All tables: {all_tables}''\)
conn.close\(\)
""")

# payments 테이블에서 최근 결제 확인

# 구독 상태 확인

for row in cursor.fetchall\(\):

import sqlite3

# subscriptions 테이블의 모든 컬럼 확인
conn = sqlite3.connect\(''/data/subscription.db''\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

# user 3의 구독 상태 전체 확인
cursor.execute\(''SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 3''\)
row = cursor.fetchone\(\)
if row:
    columns = [d[0] for d in cursor.description]
    print\(''User 3 subscription:''\)
    for i, col in enumerate\(columns\):
        print\(f''  {col}: {row[i]}''\)

conn.close\(\)
""")

Bash(/c/Users/u/.fly/bin/flyctl ssh console -a naverpay-delivery-tracker -C "python3 -c ""
import sqlite3

conn = sqlite3.connect\(''/data/subscription.db''\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

# user 3의 구독을 active로 복원
cursor.execute\(''''''
    UPDATE subscriptions 
    SET status = ''''active'''', 
        cancelled_at = NULL,
        updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    WHERE user_id = 3
''''''\)
conn.commit\(\)

# 확인
cursor.execute\(''SELECT user_id, plan_type, status, expires_at FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 3''\)
row = cursor.fetchone\(\)
print\(f''Updated: user={row[0]}, plan={row[1]}, status={row[2]}, expires={row[3]}''\)

conn.close\(\)
print\(''Subscription restored successfully!''\)
""")
